headers.onePassDesc: Local data storage, seed phrases and encryption make Turtle Network Lite reliable. However, we are moving onwards and upwards. It’s time to ramp up the security level. Log into your accounts and switch between them with a few simple clicks.
headers.onePassword: One password for all your accounts
headers.protectDesc: Set a single password for all your accounts

signUp.termsAgreement: I have read and agree with the [Terms and Conditions](https://turtlenetwork.eu/pdfs/turtlenetwork_terms_and_conditions.pdf), [Privacy Policy](https://turtlenetwork.eu/pdfs/Privacy_Policy.pdf).
